Module com.example.navalbattle
Package com.example.navalbattle.views

Class ShipDrawer

java.lang.Object
com.example.navalbattle.views.ShipDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShipDrawerInterface
public class ShipDrawer extends Object implements ShipDrawerInterface
The ShipDrawer class provides implementations for drawing various types of ships used in the Battleship game. Each ship is represented as a Group composed of shapes (such as rectangles and lines) with specific styles and dimensions. This class implements the ShipDrawerInterface, offering methods for creating different types of ships (frigate, destroyer, submarine, and aircraft carrier) with options for orientation (horizontal or vertical). The class also includes helper methods for creating basic shapes (rectangles and lines) with specific properties, such as position, size, and color.
Author:
Mateo Noguera Pinto

      public javafx.scene.Group drawFrigate(boolean vertical)
      Draws a frigate ship.
      Specified by:
      drawFrigate in interface ShipDrawerInterface
      Parameters:
      vertical - if true, the ship is drawn vertically; otherwise, horizontally.
      Returns:
      A JavaFX Group containing the graphical representation of the frigate.

      width - the width of the rectangle.
      height - the height of the rectangle.

      toY - the ending Y-coordinate of the line.
